Text:
By the way, if any of you fellow The Wire -lovers
happen to have "The Corner", could some of you please upload it here on the bay?

And for you, who don't know "The Corner":

It's some kind of prequel to The Wire and an Emmy winner of course and made by HBO, David Simon and the gang.
I have been looking for The Corner forever.  I also require a high quality PDF of The Wire book.
any chance we could get subtitles for "the Corner" as well?

I love "The Wire". Have season 1 & 2 on DVD but i couldn't find season 3 so i downloaded it.
Never seen "The Corner" but will look for it.

If anyone knows of any place i could find the norwegian subtitles for the wire, please let me know.
Thanks a lot. I go nuts looking for subs s2. I wish more people take the time to upload small but important stuff like subs to PB.
If you like the Wire and the Corner you should really check out Homicide: Life on the Streets. Its by David Simon also and precludes the Wire and the Corner. And of course it takes place in Baltimore
